articles.title: 'They're basically Hamas': Zohran Mamdani's wife mourns death of Palestinian influencer who celebrated Oc - Times of India
articles.description: Middle East News: Rama Duwaji, wife of NYC mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani, mourned the death of Palestinian influencer Saleh al-Jafarawi. Jafarawi, known as \"Mr FAFO,
